config.enable-napping.name: Enable Napping
config.enable-napping.tooltip: Show the nap option when interacting with a bed while missing energy.
config.minutes-per-stamina.name: Minutes Per Stamina
config.minutes-per-stamina.tooltip: How many in-game minutes of nap per stamina point restored. Higher = slower recovery. Default: 1.0 (135 missing stamina = ~2h20m nap).
config.max-wake-up-time.name: Latest Wake-Up Time
config.max-wake-up-time.tooltip: Latest time a nap can extend to (24h format: 1200 = noon, 1800 = 6PM). Nap is capped at this time with partial energy recovery.
